bib.title: Polish WordNet on a shoestring
bib.author: Derwojedowa, Magdalena and Piasecki, Maciej and Szpakowicz, Stanis{\l}aw and Zawis{\l}awska, Magdalena
bib.abstract: A project to create a Polish WordNet is under way. Rather than localise the English WordNet, we are constructing the lexical network from scratch, in two phases. First, we have established the linguistic principles, among them a list of semantic relations with detailed
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of Biannual Conference of the Society for Computational Linguistics and Language Technology, T{\"u}bingen, April
